title: 1958년 In re Ingianni 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: In re Ingianni. 판결일: 1958-05-12. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: In the Matter of Vincent C. Ingianni, Esther Martinson
**판결일**: 1958-05-12
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 6 A.D.2d 698

## 판결문 요약


In a habeas corpus proceeding concerning the custody of the child of the parties, the appeal is from an order dismissing the writ and awarding custody of the child to respondent. Order unanimously affirmed, with costs. No opinion. Present — Wenzel, Acting P. J., Beldock, Murphy, Ughetta and Kleinfeld, JJ.
...
